sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.persistence.data

Class AbstractResourceRegistration

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.persistence.data.AbstractResourceRegistration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Registration, ResourceRegistration
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LiveResourceRegistration, ResourcePersistenceData

    public abstract class AbstractResourceRegistration
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceRegistration
    An abstract implementation of the ResourceRegistration interface. Implemented predicates like the current registration status are obtained directly from the core using the underlying resource or resource's data.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell

    • Method Detail

      • equals

        public final boolean equals(@Nullable
             java.lang.Object o)
        Compares the specified object with this resource registration for equality. Returns true if the specified object is also a resource registration and the two registrations have the same listener type and resource name. This definition ensures that this method works properly across different implementations of the resource registration interface.
        Specified by:
        equals in interface ResourceRegistration
        Overrides:
        equals in class java.lang.Object
        Parameters:
        o - an object to be compared for equality with this resource registration
        Returns:
        true if the specified object is equal to this resource registration, false otherwise

      • hashCode

        public final int hashCode()
        Returns the hash code value for this resource registration. The hash code of a resource registration should be equivalent to the result of Objects.hash(Object...) for listener type and resource name.
        Specified by:
        hashCode in interface ResourceRegistration
        Overrides:
        hashCode in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the hash code value for this resource registration

        public final java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:

      • isRegistered

        public final boolean isRegistered()
        Returns true if the underlying registrable object is currently registered, false otherwise.
        Specified by:

      • isProvided

        public final boolean isProvided()
        Returns true if the underlying registrable object is provided by an object provider, false otherwise.
